All I wanted was to rearrange some layouts...

26 Nov 2018

While not nearly as crash-prone as Xcode's interface builder, Android Studio's designer also has its worse days.

And mind you, I wasn't working on some low-level machine, nor did I do anything fancy. Just replaced a Coordinator Layout with a Drawer Layout, or the other way round. Oh. Did I mention I saw this window twice?
